name: UpsideDown (RRooly, Dimitrouille, ratchet974)
description:
Context and presentation :

In search of your missing wife, you find yourself in a mysterious cave where an unknown technology is buried. Explore and progress through this cave to find clues about your wife.

Player Inputs  :

  • Movement : WASD
  • Shoot : Left-click
  • Aim : Right-click
  • Reload : R
  • Dash : F
  • Jump : Space bar
  • Swap to drone : C

Drone Inputs  :

  • Movement : WASD
  • Shoot : Left-click
  • MoveUp : E
  • MoveDown : Q
  • Swap to player : C

Credit :

Developped by RRooly, Ratchet974 and Dimitrouille
